page.title: 05A WORTHWHILE CAUSE.
page.content: This whole thing started because Katie and I were so concerned about a project on Ethiopia that we were doing at school. So we said we must help so things could be sent off to help them. But how? Becky and I were thinking of things like jumble sales, summer fetes or sposored events until we came up with the idea of{A GARAGE SALE.}We wanted people to know so we made out leaflets and Becky's dad photocopied them. It was a great success,it even got into the papers they wrote things like "Kind Hearted Rebecca" "Katie and Rebecca Were So Concerned" We sold books, old clothes and toys and raised Â£44.63.Everyone crowded round the tables in Becky's garage. Everyone including the Rector congratulated us.{Heroes at last.
